item.title: Canaccord downgrades Lithium Americas to sell after Trump takes equity stake
item.description: Lithium Americas rally on the Trump administration equity stake is overdone, according to Canaccord Genuity.

item.title: A health-care stock that's maintaining momentum despite regulatory headwinds
item.description: Frank Holland breaks down what traders are watching ahead of the new session.

item.title: JPMorgan doubles the price target for this booming clean energy stock
item.description: Bloom Energy shares have gained about 300% this year as its onsite power generation systems are in high demand from data center customers.

item.title: A buying opportunity has emerged in this agriculture stock, JPMorgan says
item.description: Analyst Jeffrey Zekauskas upgraded Corteva to overweight from neutral, saying the agricultural stock is undervalued after Wednesday's drawdown.

item.title: Nike gets an upgrade from KeyBanc as turnaround materializes
